Package es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.views

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoardUI.PlayControlsListener
    An interface with methods to perform actions when a cell is clicked Una interfaz que proporciona metodos para realizar acciones cuando una casilla es clicada.
    SettingsPanel.SettingsControlsListener
    An interface that provides the methods that will dictate the actions to be performed when a button in this settings panel is pressed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardUI
    Class BoardUI A class that represents the gaming table in a graphic interface.
    GenericSwingView
    Class GenericSwingView A class that represents the SwingView for any board game.
    MyFrame
    A class that represents the JFrame hosting the application.
    PieceColorMap
    Class PieceColorMap A class that represents a map that tells a piece a color to paint itself.
    PlayerInfoTable
    Class PlayerInfoTable A class representing the table that contains information about the players The information displayed in this table is: -Name of the player -Current mode of the player -Current number of that player's pieces in game.
    SettingsPanel
    Class SettingsPanel A class that represents the settings panel for a board game.
    Square
    Class Square Represents a cell in the gaming board.
    SwingViewFrame
    A class that represents the JFrame hosting the application.
